Peacock UIMotion-first Design System

A high-fidelity component library for React 19, built for the next generation of web interfaces. Fluid, holographic, and universally accessible.

Get Started
View Components
‚ö°Ô∏è

Motion Native

Built on Framer Motion v12. Components aren't just static; they live, breathe, and react with fluid spring physics.

üíé

Quantum Design

Introducing the "Quantum" design language. Holographic surfaces, deep blurs, and physics-based interactions that feel tangible.

üß©

Radix Primitives

Accessible, unstyled, and headless primitives from Radix UI serve as the robust foundation for our high-fidelity components.

üé®

Dynamic Theming

Powerful CSS variables and Tailwind plugin integration. Switch between Quantum, Nebula, and Aurora themes instantly.

‚öõÔ∏è

React 19 Ready

Fully compatible with React 19, Server Components, and the latest Next.js patterns.

üï∏Ô∏è

WebGL Physics

Integrated 3D capabilities using Three.js and Cannon.js for truly immersive experiences.

Trusted by Next-Gen Developers ‚Äã

Peacock UI is more than a library; it's a statement. It rejects the flat, boring web of the 2010s and embraces depth, motion, and interactivity.

Key Principles ‚Äã

  1. Fluidity over Staticity: Every interaction should have a consequence.
  2. Dark Mode First: Optimized for OLED screens and deep contrast.
  3. Performance: Heavy visuals, light footprint. optimized for 60fps+.
